text: whyana lhwla' alzaalimin aljahdyn qurana' fasdyn min shayatin al'iins waljn, fazayanuu lahum qbayh 'aemalahum fi aldnya, wdeawhm 'iilaa ldhatha wshhwatha almhrmt, wzayanu lahum maa khalfhm min 'umur alakhrt, fanswhm dhikrha, wdeawhm 'iilaa altkdhyb balmead, wbdhlk asthqu dukhul alnnar fi jumlatan 'umam sabiqat min kfrt aljini wal'ins, 'iinahum kanuu khasirin 'aemaluhum fi aldunya wa'anfusahum wa'ahlihim yawm alqyamt
